public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {

    private Button btnAnalyse;
    private TextView tvProgress;
    //手机文件路径
    private final String FILE_PATH = ".../s19file.txt";

    @Override
    protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main);
        initViews();
        btnAnalyse.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
            @Override
            public void onClick(View v) {
                S19FileUtil s19FileUtil = new S19FileUtil(getApplicationContext(), tvProgress);
                s19FileUtil.readWordsFromFile(FILE_PATH);
            }
        });
    }

    private void initViews() {
        btnAnalyse = (Button) findViewById(R.id.btn_analyse);
        tvProgress = (TextView) findViewById(R.id.tv_progress);
    }
}


//页面布局文件
activity_main.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:padding="10dp">


    <Button
        android:id="@+id/btn_analyse"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:text="解析数据"
        android:textColor="@android:color/black" />
    <TextView
        android:id="@+id/tv_progress"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent" />

</LinearLayout>

//数据文件 s19file.txt
